Uses of Class
cbccore.motors.statemotors.AbstractAdvancedStateMotor

Packages that use AbstractAdvancedStateMotor
cbccore.motors Provides the high-level siblings for the Motor and Servo classes found in cbccore.low. 
cbccore.motors.statemotors Contains interfaces and classes that allow one to use Motor and Servo objects as state machines.
